alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 10:39AM CDT until April 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening to a crest of 20.5 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
